data.title: St. Louis Cardinals Color Codes Hex, RGB, and CMYK
data.meta_description: The St. Louis Cardinals colors are Cardinal Red, Navy, Yellow and White. This page includes their Hex, RGB, CMYK and PANTONE color codes.
data.text:
The St. Louis Cardinals colors are Cardinal red, navy, yellow, and white. The St. Louis Cardinals team colors in Hex, RGB, and CMYK can be found below. The St. Louis Cardinals are a team from St. Louis, Missouri. The biggest rivals of the St. Louis Cardinals are the Chicago Cubs.

St. Louis Cardinals Primary Colors

The primary colors of the St. Louis Cardinals can be found in the table below.

St. Louis Cardinals Pantone Color Codes

The St. Louis Cardinals MLB team Pantone colors are PMS 200 C for Cardinal red, PMS 289 C for navy, and PMS 107 C for yellow.

The Cardinal red Pantone color of the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

PMS 200 C

The navy Pantone color of the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

PMS 289 C

The yellow Pantone color of the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

PMS 107 C

St. Louis Cardinals Color Codes HEX

The St. Louis Cardinals colors HEX codes are #C41E3A for Cardinal red, #0C2340 for navy, #FEDB00 for yellow, and #FFFFFF for white.

The Cardinal red HEX color code for the St. Louis Cardinals baseball team can be found below.

#C41E3A

The navy HEX colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

#0C2340

The yellow HEX colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

#FEDB00

The white HEX colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

#FFFFFF

St. Louis Cardinals Color Codes RGB

The St. Louis Cardinals colors RGB codes are (196, 30, 58) for Cardinal red, (12, 35, 64) for navy, (254, 219, 0) for yellow, and (255, 255, 255) for white colour.

The Cardinal red RGB color code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(196, 30, 58)

The navy RGB colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(12, 35, 64)

The yellow RGB colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(254, 219, 0)

The white RGB colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(255, 255, 255)

St. Louis Cardinals Color Codes CMYK

The St. Louis Cardinals colors CMYK codes are (0, 100, 65, 15) for Cardinal red, (100, 60, 0, 56) for navy, (0, 0, 100, 0) for yellow, and (0, 0, 0, 0) for white color.

The Cardinal red CMYK color code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(0, 100, 65, 15)

The navy CMYK colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(100, 60, 0, 56)

The yellow CMYK colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(0, 0, 100, 0)

The white CMYK colour code for the St. Louis Cardinals can be found below.

(0, 0, 0, 0)

St. Louis Cardinals Logo Colors

The St. Louis Cardinals logo colors are Cardinal red, navy, yellow, and white. The Cardinal red color code for the St. Louis Cardinals logo is Pantone: PMS 200 C, Hex Color: #C41E3A, RGB: (196, 30, 58), CMYK: (0, 100, 65, 15). The navy color code for the St. Louis Cardinals logo is Pantone: PMS 289 C, Hex Color: #0C2340, RGB: (12, 35, 64), CMYK: (100, 60, 0, 56). The yellow color code for the St. Louis Cardinals logo is Pantone: PMS 107 C, Hex Color: #FEDB00, RGB: (254, 219, 0), CMYK: (0, 0, 100, 0). The white color code for the St. Louis Cardinals logo is Hex Color: #FFFFFF, RGB: (255, 255, 255), CMYK: (0, 0, 0, 0).

St. Louis Cardinals Logo

The St. Louis Cardinals logo has Cardinal red, navy, yellow, and white colors and features a red bird standing on a yellow baseball bat. Under it, stands the inscription ‘Cardinals’, written in cursive. The St. Louis Cardinals logo meaning symbolizes the team name, the sport of baseball, and the northern cardinal bird which was the inspiration for the team name.

St. Louis Cardinals Logo Color Palette Image Format

The St. Louis Cardinals logo colours can be found in an image format below.

St. Louis Cardinals Logo Fonts

The St. Louis Cardinals logo font is a custom MLB St. Louis Cardinals font. The MLB St. Louis Cardinals font is used for jersey lettering, player names, numbers, team logo, branding, and merchandise.

St. Louis Cardinals Logo JPG

The St. Louis Cardinals logo JPG format can be found below.

To download the St. Louis Cardinals logo JPG format, right-click and choose save.

St. Louis Cardinals Logo PNG

The St. Louis Cardinals logo PNG format can be found below.

To download the St. Louis Cardinals logo PNG format, right-click and choose save.

St. Louis Cardinals Jersey 2022

The St. Louis Cardinals jersey colors are red, navy, yellow, and white. The St. Louis Cardinals uniform has been the same since 2000. The St. Louis Cardinals jersey in an image format can be found below.

To download the St. Louis Cardinals 2022 jersey image, right click and choose save.
